The locations that the SoundTouch sources were obtained from.

http://www.surina.net/soundtouch/soundtouch-1.3.1.zip
http://www.surina.net/soundtouch/soundtouch-1.4.0.zip
http://www.surina.net/soundtouch/soundtouch-1.7.1.tar.gz
http://www.surina.net/soundtouch/soundtouch-1.9.2.zip
http://soundtouch.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/soundtouch/trunk.tar.gz?view=tar

04 Jan 2010 IanB
24 Aug 2013 pylorak (1.7.1)
02 Jul 2016 pylorak (1.9.2)
18 Mar 2019 pinterf (Snapshot of 07 Jan 2019; 2.1.3 not final) https://gitlab.com/soundtouch/soundtouch
   Clone it to a local git repo e.g. soundtouch
   Copy soundtouch/source/SoundTouch contents (except makefile.am and SoundTouch.sln) to \plugins\TimeStretch\SoundTouch\
   Rename mmx_optimized.cpp to mmx_optimized.cpp_disabled
   Copy soundtouch/include/*.h files to to \plugins\TimeStretch\SoundTouch\(SoundTouch.h STTypes.h FIFOSamplePipe.h FIFOSampleBuffer.h BPMDetect.h)
